alluvial.crops: 🌾 Wheat, 🍚 Rice, 🏭 Sugarcane, 🌱 Pulses, 🌽 Maize, 🥜 Oilseeds
alluvial.fertilizers: Use balanced NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) and organic manure. Split application improves efficiency.
alluvial.notes: Highly fertile and found in river basins. Retains moisture well.

black.fertilizers: Rich in minerals but needs extra phosphorus and nitrogen for better yield.
black.notes: Also called Regur soil. Cracks in summer help aeration.

red.fertilizers: Add nitrogen fertilizers and compost for best results.
red.notes: Low in nitrogen and humus. Needs organic matter to boost fertility.

laterite.fertilizers: Apply organic manure and green manuring frequently, as soil is less fertile.
laterite.notes: Common in high rainfall areas. Leached soil, acidic in nature.

desert.crops: 🌴 Bajra, 🌾 Barley, 🌱 Drought-resistant pulses, 🌿 Aloe vera
desert.fertilizers: Needs nitrogen fertilizers and drip irrigation for better results.
desert.notes: Found in arid regions. Very low in moisture and organic matter.
